entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MacOS Failure to Restore with signature validation issue #58202
    17.1
  • Incorrect nullability warnings reported for compound assignments with lifted struct operators #58201
  • InitializeToolset flakiness in correctness builds #58199
    17.1
  • Failing expression compiler tests involving async lambdas #58198
  • NuGet.Protocol.Core.Types.FatalProtocolException exception in helix work items #58197
    17.1
  • Decompiler does not decode some assemblies... #58192
  • FindAllReferences on Length property or Slice method misses usages in list-patterns #58190
    17.1
  • Compile as .netmodule fails, but exe is working #58193
  • Move away from binary trees in regex parser #58186
    Backlog

Closed

  • TestGetAsyncEnumeratorPatternOnRange is flaky #58196
  • "IDE0004 C# Cast is redundant" is reported incorrectly for default #49954
    Backlog
  • *.resources FileNotFoundException, this is nonsense. #58155
  • Weird nullable detection #58187
  • Redundant cast is not redundant! #54388
    Backlog
  • C# compiler casting bug (erroneous CS0675) #42816
  • switch expression casting from/to enum and ushort suggests invalid fix in VS 2019 16..4.0 Preview 5.0 #40167
    Backlog
  • IDE cannot make up it’s mind: cast is necessary or unnecessary for nullable reference? #33285
    Backlog
  • False positive "Cast is redundant" #37041
    Backlog
  • IDE wrongly reports "Cast is Redundant" for an implicit conversion #36782
    Backlog
  • Incorrect cast is redundant in switch expression with nullable value type. #36755
    Backlog
  • Incorrect "Cast is redundant" when negating Int32-typecast-to-Int64 #34553
    Backlog
  • false positive redundant cast #32773
    Backlog
  • VS shows cast to (ulong) as reduncant when its not #31303
    Backlog
  • Conflicting errors when casting between Func/Action and Delegate #25165
    Backlog
  • Incorrect IDE004 "Cast is redundant" hint #11008
    Backlog
  • Incorrect ID0004 - when constructing a ValueTuple which is then assigned to object #33143
    Backlog
  • IDE0004 False positive #33043
    Backlog
  • Incorrect IDE0004 (Cast is redundant) in sign extended operations #20617
    Backlog
  • Incorrect "Cast is redundant" for constant patterns where the constant is an explicit cast from a numeric literal #45925
    Backlog
  • Incorrect IDE0004 in iterator #37473
    Backlog
  • IDE0004 incorrectly suggested for method with nullable result and conditional operator with default result #34509
    Backlog
  • check other calls for Incorrect IDE0004 "Cast is redundant" - https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/pull/32467 #33176
    Backlog
  • IDE0004 reported incorrectly for a delegate cast #58171
  • Incorrect IDE0004: Remove unnecessary cast #58095
  • IDE0004: Cast is redundant not true when removing nullable for returning a value. #49690
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Integration test MetadataReference #58204
    Area-IDE
  • Update several ExpressionCompiler unit tests for inferred delegate types #58203
    Area-Interactive
  • Add and implement `IImplicitIndexerReferenceOperation` #58200
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Range
  • Respond to changes in project context to support w/out navbar and mul… #58195
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Find unit test assemblies whose names differ from the project directory name #58194
    Area-Infrastructure
  • use same defaults for naming style as ship with the dotnet sdk #58185
    Area-IDE
  • Merges/main to features/param nullchecking #58183
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Parameter null-checking analyzer and fixer #58182
    Area-Analyzers

Merged

  • BoundDecisionDag.Rewrite - Avoid capturing the replacement map #58137
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Add regex parser tests #58184
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add test demonstrating issue does not repro. #58178
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Use !! in AddParameterCheck refactoring #57934
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #58181
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58180
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #58205
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • List patterns: Skip compiler-generated dag nodes for better codegen #57909
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Simplify lazy initialization in RazorDocumentServiceProviderWrapper #58063
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #58069
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Use ElasticSpace instead of ElasticZeroSpace #58152
    Area-IDE
  • Use interpolated string handler for Contract.ThrowIf methods #58173
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Inline Hints: Added double click on hint to insert text #55737
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Inline Parameter Hints
  • Avoid calculating inferred delegate type unnecessarily in conversions and type inference #58115
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements
  • Add support for interpolations in raw string literals. #57979
    Area-Compilers
  • Synthesize delegate types for lambdas with parameter types or return type that are not valid type arguments #57295
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix generator caching in compiler server #57177
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Update Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Analyzers to 3.3.3 #58154
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Method group conversion caching redo #57882
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Update instructions for building runtime repo #58172
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
